body_html:
I can't seem to get it working with gcc/g++-4.8. I'm using Ubunutu 17.10/ CUDA 9 / CuDNN 7.
I'm only using pyenv instead of conda but i don't think that should be much different apart from no magma (which I don't mind).
Compilation stops at about 45% with the following errors:

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(42): error: namespace "std" has no member "to_string"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(28): error: namespace "std" has no member "isinf"
              detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(61): here

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(31): error: namespace "std" has no member "isnan"
              detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(61): here

    3 errors detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_0000129a_00000000-10_IndexUtils.compute_70.cpp1.ii".
    CMake Error at ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
      Error generating file
      /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/./ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o


    src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1134: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o' failed
    make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o] Error 1
    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(28): error: namespace "std" has no member "isinf"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(31): error: namespace "std" has no member "isnan"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(42): error: namespace "std" has no member "to_string"

Full log: pytorch_build.txt

I've been trying to compile for Ubuntu 17.10 for quite a while, I'm aware of the gcc5 issue, gcc6 also gave similar errors as above and gcc4.8 also doesn't work for me. Are they any fixes planned for gcc6?

body:
I can't seem to get it working with gcc/g++-4.8. I'm using Ubunutu 17.10/ CUDA 9 / CuDNN 7.
I'm only using pyenv instead of conda but i don't think that should be much different apart from no magma (which I don't mind).
Compilation stops at about 45% with the following errors:
```
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(42): error: namespace "std" has no member "to_string"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(28): error: namespace "std" has no member "isinf"
              detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(61): here

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(31): error: namespace "std" has no member "isnan"
              detected during instantiation of "To at::checked_convert<To,From>(From, const char *) [with To=uint8_t, From=double]"
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Scalar.h(61): here

    3 errors detected in the compilation of "/tmp/tmpxft_0000129a_00000000-10_IndexUtils.compute_70.cpp1.ii".
    CMake Error at ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o.cmake:267 (message):
      Error generating file
      /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/torch/lib/build/aten/src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/./ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o


    src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/build.make:1134: recipe for target 'src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o' failed
    make[2]: *** [src/ATen/CMakeFiles/ATen.dir/cuda/detail/ATen_generated_IndexUtils.cu.o] Error 1
    make[2]: *** Waiting for unfinished jobs....
    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(28): error: namespace "std" has no member "isinf"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(31): error: namespace "std" has no member "isnan"

    /tmp/pip-osju86eo-build/aten/src/ATen/Half.h(42): error: namespace "std" has no member "to_string"
```


Full log: [pytorch_build.txt](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1725644/pytorch_build.txt)

I've been trying to compile for Ubuntu 17.10 for quite a while, I'm aware of the gcc5 issue, gcc6 also gave similar errors as above and gcc4.8 also doesn't work for me. Are they any fixes planned for gcc6?
